metadata.description: Collection of always-current documentation navigation plugins for popular open source projects

plugins.name: clickhouse-docs
plugins.description: Always-current ClickHouse documentation with indexed navigation. Use when working with ClickHouse data modeling, ETL, query optimization, or operations.

plugins.name: polars-docs
plugins.description: Always-current Polars documentation navigation. Use when working with Polars DataFrames, expressions, lazy API, or data transformations.

plugins.name: github-docs
plugins.description: Always-current GitHub documentation navigation. Use when working with GitHub Actions, Copilot, APIs, security, or administration.
